item.title: Medical-Device Maker Mindray Picks Huatai, JPMorgan for Hong Kong Listing
item.description: China’s biggest maker of medical devices, Shenzhen Mindray Bio-Medical Electronics Co., has picked banks for its planned Hong Kong listing, according to people familiar with the matter.
